description: Retrieve the theoretical [O/Fe] abundance ratio plateau value resulting purely from core-collapse supernova (CCSN) yields adopted in the paper.
instructions: Retrieve the value of the [O/Fe] abundance ratio plateau representative of pure core-collapse supernova (CCSN) enrichment, based on the specific CCSN yields adopted in the paper (Section 2.1). Report the value in dex.
output_justification: Stated directly in Section 2.1: "The chosen yields for this paper produce a plateau at [O/Fe]=0.45".
